short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sneak peek for ethereum (or ens) addresses (and it converts them to links).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
EthPeek replaces Ethereum addresses (i.E.: 0xd8da6bf26964af9d7eed9e03e53415d37aa96045)
or ENS addresses (i.E.: vitalik.eth) with links that can be hovered over to get a quick sneak peek of that address.
